contentList.content: Despite no ancestral links to the mighty creatures, these dragonborn share the charcoal colouration and fizzling, acrid breath of black dragons.
Spew forth a cone of necrotic fumes.
Spew forth a cone of poison.
Emit a shockwave of malevolent thunder that damages nearby creatures and possibly knocks them <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="PRONE">Prone</LSTag>.
Spew forth a cone of acid.
Release an ectoplasmic pulse that knocks living creatures back [1].
Putrefy a creature with the necrotic energy filling your hands.
Touch an enemy to siphon their life force and regain half as many <LSTag Tooltip="HitPoints">hit points</LSTag>.
For 10 turns, you can use Vampiric Touch again without expending an additional spell slot.
Siphon the life force from an enemy without expending a <LSTag Tooltip="SpellSlot">spell slot</LSTag>. They take [1] and you regain half as many <LSTag Tooltip="HitPoints">hit points</LSTag>.
Prevent the target from healing until your next turn. An undead target receives <LSTag Tooltip="Disadvantage">Disadvantage</LSTag> on <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Rolls</LSTag>.
Pull one creature or object towards you.
The target takes [1] each turn and <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Rolls</LSTag> against it have <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag>.
Plants take maximum damage from this spell, and have <LSTag Tooltip="Disadvantage">Disadvantage</LSTag> on the <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throw</LSTag> against it.
Raise a mildewed, mould-encrusted zombie from a corpse.
Unleash a cloud of necrotic spores upon a target. This uses a reaction, so other reactions won't trigger this turn.
Seed an area in deadly spores that deal [1] per turn to all creatures that inhale them, except you and your allies.
Reduce a target's maximum <LSTag Tooltip="HitPoints">hit points</LSTag>, but never below [1].
Seed an area in deadly spores that deal [1] per turn to all creatures that inhale them, except you and your allies.
Sculpt a massive sphere of entropic energy around a creature. Devastate the target and all surrounding creatures.
Spew forth a cone of necrotic fumes.
Despite no ancestral links to the mighty creatures, these dragonborn share the charcoal colouration and fizzling, acrid breath of black dragons.
Spew forth a cone of spored fumes.
